item.title: Bridge returned error 500! (18698)
item.content:encoded:
blm5280 - Instagram Bridge was unable to receive or process the remote website's content!
Error message: `Unable to find username in search result.`
Query string: `action=display&bridge=Instagram&context=Username&u=blm5280&media_type=all&direct_links=on&format=Atom`
Version: `dev.2020-02-26`

  • Press Return to check your input parameters
  • Press F5 to retry
  • Check if this issue was already reported on GitHub (give it a thumbs-up)
  • Open a GitHub Issue if this error persists

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Padres & Jóvenes Unidos🗣HEAR FROM EXPERTS ABOUT DISRUPTING THE SCHOOL-TO-PRISON PIPELINE Register here:...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Padres & Jóvenes Unidos

🗣HEAR FROM EXPERTS ABOUT DISRUPTING THE SCHOOL-TO-PRISON PIPELINE

Register here: https://p2a.co/MxVyND8

Join us at Padres & Jóvenes Unidos in partnership with... Stand for Children Colorado on Wednesday, March 10 at 4:30 pm to hear from a panel of experts about the school to prison pipeline—both the problem and potential solutions.

We are leading efforts at the Capitol to advance solutions to disrupt and end the school-to-prison pipeline. We will share information about how to get involved in supporting those efforts, reserve plenty of time for questions, and spend time reflecting on what we've heard. This event will be fully bilingual in Spanish and English.

🗣ESCUCHE A LOS EXPERTOS SOBRE LA INTERRUPCIÓN DE LA VÍA DE LA ESCUELA A LA CÁRCEL

Regístrate aquí: https://p2a.co/MxVyND8

Únate a Padres y Jóvenes Unidos y Stand for Children Colorado el miércoles 10 de marzo a las 4:30 pm. Tendremos un panel de expertos discutiendo la criminalización de estudiantes y las posibles soluciones.

Padres está liderando esfuerzos en el Capitolio para avanzar en soluciones para la criminalización de estudiantes y prevenir que vayan de la escuela a la cárcel. Compartiremos información sobre cómo participar en el apoyo a esos esfuerzos, contestaremos preguntas y reflexionaremos sobre lo que hemos escuchado. Este evento será completamente bilingüe, en español e inglés.

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and GirlsLet us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+5GirlTrek: Healthy Black Women and Girls

Let us always remember the time GirlTrek walked 100 miles in the literal footsteps of Harriet Tubman.

In March 2018, we rallied a group of Trekkers to go on a ...walking journey that started in the Eastern Shore of Maryland, where Harriet Tubman made her first escape, and went along the path she took to freedom along the Harriet Tubman Underground Railroad Byway.

It was Harriet’s Great Escape. We trekked in sun, sleet and cold weather to exemplify radical courage and unshakeable sisterhood.

Harriet Tubman saved her own life first and then went back time after time to save the lives of others giving us the blueprint for the work GirlTrek does today.

This is radical self-care at its core.

See More
item.author: Black Lives Matter 5280

item.title: #ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

#ToFreedom #MutualAid #Reparations

Hess Love

Today is Harriet Tubman Day, it's the anniversary of her transition into Ancestorhood. She is one of the most formidable, collectively elevated Ancestors known ...in our tradition. A visionary. Literally a visionary in the political, spiritual, and social sense. Harriet Tubman thought about the collective AND she thought about herself, remember, 𝘴𝘩𝘦 was the FIRST person that she took up north.

A spiritual thing that you can do in her honor is to send money to Black mutual aid orgs. Sharing money is sharing energy. ✨

Please list some orgs in the comments.

See More

item.title: Black Lives Matter 5280Ari RaeDenver and Front Range area! We are expected to get up to 2.5 ft of snow this week and our unhoused neighbors...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280Ari Rae

Denver and Front Range area! We are expected to get up to 2.5 ft of snow this week and our unhoused neighbors needs supplies. Tents, tarps, sleeping bags, emerg...ency blankets, warm underlayers, Hand warmers, toe warmers, warm socks and more!

Here are some places accepting supplies:

Mutiny Information Cafe and Amethyst Coffee- Broadway

If you have GOOD WARM GEAR I can pick up this week before the storm as well!

Also, you can venmo me
@Ari_1312 as I will be doing a supply drop before the storm.
The Venmo listed on Comrade Collective's infographic below is also taking donations!

The last storm took the lives of 4 people and many left with frost bite.

Good tips for every day is to keep kits in your car with handwarmers, water, snacks and warm socks and pass out when you drive past folks.

If you need resources on mutual aid groups to donate to in Boulder/Northern Colorado feel free to DM me

See More

item.title: ❗️❗️❗️All my homies hate Mayor...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

❗️❗️❗️All my homies hate Mayor Hancock❗️❗️❗️
Please show up and support with whatever is needed!
With the storm coming this weekend people are going to need more survival gear to replace what is being stolen from them and destroyed!
Tarps, tents, and hand warmers are always needed.
You can get tarps for only $6-$7 at most big box stores.

item.title: It hurts how relevant this still is. Unfriendly Reminder:
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280 shared a memory.

It hurts how relevant this still is.
Unfriendly Reminder:

5 Years AgoSee Your Memorieschevron-rightBlack Lives Matter 5280

To those who are on here saying, "Black Lives Matter!", AND, "Yesterday's 'homeless sweep' was a good thing!":
Please pick one of those sentences and stop saying it immediately.
That is all.
#MoveAlongToWhere

item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280+7Anti-Racism Daily

No, Dr. Seuss was not "canceled" by the "woke mob" this week. Learn more about the weaponization of "cancel culture" by conservative media to distract from the ...accountability that matters most.

👉🏾 Swipe for excerpts
📰 Read the full story and access all sources at antiracismdaily.com/read

This article also references an article with tools to discuss racist tropes in children's media with kids. What new children's media are you excited about for you and the kids in your life? Let us know in the comments 👇🏾

item.title: White Supremacy and fatphobia are inseparable. “Recognize...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

White Supremacy and fatphobia are inseparable.

“Recognize your relationship to food. Notice if it feels almost like a fight. Are you in opposition to your body? If so, look for a therapist you can relate to, like a Black therapist, who deals with eating disorders to help you achieve peace. If you can’t afford to see a therapist, you can find support groups of Black women with eating disorders run by community groups. Practice working with your intuition as well. The answers ...you seek are already there inside yourself. Mindfulness, quieting the mind, and checking in with ourselves is a powerful tool as well. Really listen to your inner voice that tells you what you really are hungry for.”

🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥🔥

https://blackgirlnerds.com/black-women-and-hidden-eating-d…/

See MoreAn interview with Licensed Therapist Alishia McCullough

blackgirlnerds.com

Black Women and Hidden Eating Disorders: Letting Go of Trauma and Embracing Black and Embodied Learning

An interview with Licensed Therapist Alishia McCulloughAn interview with Licensed Therapist Alishia McCullough

item.title: Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will...
item.content:encoded:
Black Lives Matter 5280

Many have asked about where to donate. We have shared and will continue to share links to bail/legal support fundraising in Denver, Minneapolis and beyond. We encourage friends to donate to BLM5280’s Emergency Fund using Venmo http://venmo.com/BLM5280 . These donations will be used for bail, legal support, and provision of direct services for Black people impacted by the current and ongoing crisis. If you would like to make a tax-deductible donation that we will have access to at a later date, you can visit our Colorado Gives Day Page to donate through our fiscal sponsor, Rocky Mountain Peace and Justice Center.

Working with residents and organizations in Denver, Black Lives Matter 5280 assists in building more loving and united Black communities while eliminating anti-Black violence and racism. To expose, address and eradicate structures and systems of oppression in Denver, BLM5280 uses a holistic racial j...

coloradogives.org
